---
title: About
---

Hello, world!

*Let's try a little R-markdown, shall we?*

```{r cool-plot, fig.cap='A cool plot.', warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)
plot_ly(data = iris, x = ~Sepal.Length, y = ~Petal.Length,
               marker = list(size = 10,
                             color = 'rgba(255, 182, 193, .9)',
                             line = list(color = 'rgba(152, 0, 0, .8)',
                                         width = 2)))
```

#### How about this map!

```{r cool-map, fig.cap='A cool map.', warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng=174.768, lat=-36.852, popup="The birthplace of R")
```

#### Time series, anyone?!

```{r cool-ts, fig.cap='A cool time series.', warning=FALSE}
library(dygraphs)
lungDeaths <- cbind(mdeaths, fdeaths)
dygraph(lungDeaths)
```

#### Now for a table!

```{r cool-table, fig.cap='A cool table.', warning=FALSE}
library(reactable)
reactable(iris)
```
